version_description:
Non preoccuparti più dei convertitori di valuta! Adesso puoi pagare la tua prenotazione con qualsiasi moneta: libbra, dollaro, franco svizzero, corona danese, corona svedese o corona norvegese.
Inoltre, a partire da adesso puoi usufruire di una nuova modalità di pagamento: iDeal.
Upgraded app performance and minor troubleshooting.
Upgraded app performance and minor troubleshooting.

With each upgrade, we seek to enhance the user experience and make the app more convenient and easy to use. In the latest version, you'll notice that our Customise your Flight page has been revamped and you'll find new functions to guide you throughout your journey.
As always, we welcome any questions/comments/appraisals!
This update also corrects minor errors and improves the application's performance.

Hi!

We'd like to introduce you to a new member of the Vueling family: EVA, your travel assistant. This new service will allow us to be with you throughout your trip. We'll help you get everything ready on the days leading up to your flight and you'll get notifications at the airport on the day.

Plus, in this new upgrade, you'll notice that our app has been given a small makeover. We hope you like it!

You can book your flights now on our app to travel across the pond! Our friends at Level take you from Barcelona to Buenos Aires, Punta Cana, San Francisco and Los Angeles, and we connect you with Barcelona. Book it all easily on your mobile!

We've also made a few changes to some of the screens to improve your browsing experience.

Thanks to your comments, we continue working on a daily basis to improve the app and make it even more useful. We'll soon be launching new and exciting features.

This update also corrects minor errors and improves the application's performance.

Thanks to your comments, we continue working on a daily basis to improve the app and make it even more useful. For instance, in this version we have resolved the minor issue we had in our app at the iPad.

We'll soon be launching new and exciting features!

Thanks to your comments, we continue working on a daily basis to improve the app and make it even more useful. We'll soon be launching new and exciting features.
This update also corrects minor errors and improves the application's performance.

Now you can enter the Advanced Passenger Information (API) faster: scan the details directly from your ID card with your mobile phone camera!
This update also includes new functions that improve your experience with the app, improves its performance and fixes a few small issues.
Thanks to your comments, we continue working on a daily basis to improve the app and make it even more useful. We'll soon be launching new and exciting features.

* VUELING CLUB

Sign up for Vueling Club directly on your mobile phone and start to collect Avios every time you book. The more Avios you collect, the more you'll save on future flights! And if you ever forget to collect Avios when you book, you can also retrieve them on the app.

* VUELING CLUB

Sign up for Vueling Club directly on your mobile phone and start to collect Avios every time you book. The more Avios you collect, the more you'll save on future flights! And if you ever forget to collect Avios when you book, you can also retrieve them on the app.

Thanks to your comments, we continue working on a daily basis to improve the app and make it even more useful. We'll soon be launching new and exciting features.

This update also corrects minor errors and improves the application's performance.
We've pulled out all the stops, and our app is now available for the iPhone X. Plus, with this new upgrade, you will be able to see the status of your baggage if there has been an incident. Enjoy!

Thanks to your comments, we continue working on a daily basis to improve the app and make it even more useful. We'll soon be launching new and exciting features.
This update also corrects minor errors and improves the application's performance.

Thanks to your comments, we continue working on a daily basis to improve the app and make it even more useful. We'll soon be launching new and exciting features.
This update also corrects minor errors and improves the application's performance.
Our new release is here! This latest update brings a fresh look to your flight screen. It will now be much easier to access your booking and boarding passes, even offline. We hope you like it!

If you travel with an infant often you'll be interested in this new feature... Free online check-in for infants is now available! No more queueing at the check-in desk and your trips will be easier and more convenient!

This update also corrects minor errors and improves the app's performance.

Over the past few weeks we've been busy improving our service to book bags for your flights. We're sure you'll notice the difference! One of the new features is that now you can add bags for one way only.

And with this update you can also check your latest Avios transactions in your Vueling Club account, which is something many of you were asking about.

We hope you continue to enjoy using our app!

What personal data does Vueling store? What do they do with it? Can I change any of it? With our new updated Privacy Policy, which is completely transparent and uses simplified language, and complies with the new General Data Protection Regulation, you'll have more control over your personal data.

This update also corrects minor errors and improves the app's performance.

What personal data does Vueling store? What do they do with it? Can I change any of it? With our new updated Privacy Policy, which is completely transparent and uses simplified language, and complies with the new General Data Protection Regulation, you'll have more control over your personal data.

This update also corrects minor errors and improves the app's performance.

Thanks to your comments, we continue working on a daily basis to improve the app and make it even more useful. We'll soon be launching new and exciting features.

This update also corrects minor errors and improves the application's performance.

Thanks to your comments, we continue working on a daily basis to improve the app and make it even more useful. We'll soon be launching new and exciting features.

This update also corrects minor errors and improves the application's performance.
Now you don't need to keep opening our app every time you want to check your next flight or get your boarding passes: just add our widget to your phone's notification centre to keep everything handy.

Calling all animal lovers! There was something we wanted to do for you, and we've finally done it. You can now add your pet to your bookings via our app. Your pet can now travel with you wherever you go!

Thanks to your comments, we continue working on a daily basis to improve the app and make it even more useful. We'll soon be launching new and exciting features.
This update also corrects minor errors and improves the application's performance.

We have a lot of news! With this new version we're launching our new Family and TimeFlex fares, which are more adapted to our customers' needs. Not only that: the characteristics of our seats have also changed. Update our app and enjoy these new benefits!

In this new upgrade, you'll notice that our app has been given a small makeover.
And as usual, we've corrected some minor issues and enhanced the performance of our app.

We have a lot of news! With this new version we're launching our new Family and TimeFlex fares, which are more adapted to our customers' needs. Not only that: the characteristics of our seats have also changed. Update our app and enjoy these new benefits!

Take a look at our revamped app. As well as correcting a few details, we've developed a new version of the payment experience part to make it easier to use and more attractive. And guess what? There are no longer any fees for card payments. Which gives you more choice when deciding how you want to pay for your next trip.

We know a 3-day mini-break is not the same as a 2-week holiday, which is why you can now choose the weight of the bag you want to check in. Choose between 15, 20, 25 or 30 kilos and fly with everything you need!

Hi Siri! Welcome to Vueling. We've built Siri shortcuts into our app so that you can add voice commands and ask Siri to carry out specific actions related to your bookings. "Siri, check in online for me", "Siri, what's the status of my flight?", etc. Try it out!

Besides, the latest upgrade comes with a new design to make it easier to select seats and add passengers to your booking from your phone contacts.
With this new update, you can edit the contact details in your personal area. Plus, we've corrected some minor issues to improve the performance of our app. We hope you continue to enjoy using it!

Thanks to your comments, we continue working on a daily basis to improve the app and make it even more useful. We'll soon be launching new and exciting features.
This update also corrects minor errors and improves the application's performance.

Thanks to your comments, we continue working on a daily basis to improve the app and make it even more useful. We'll soon be launching new and exciting features.
This update also corrects minor errors and improves the application's performance.

Hi Siri! Welcome to Vueling. We've built Siri shortcuts into our app so that you can add voice commands and ask Siri to carry out specific actions related to your bookings. "Siri, check in online for me", "Siri, what's the status of my flight?", etc. Try it out!

Besides, the latest upgrade comes with a new design to make it easier to select seats and add passengers to your booking from your phone contacts.

Besides, the latest upgrade comes with a new design to make it easier to select seats and add passengers to your booking from your phone contacts.

In this new upgrade, you'll notice that our app has been given a small makeover.
And as usual, we've corrected some minor issues and enhanced the performance of our app.

New online boarding pass for babies. If you are traveling with a baby, you can go to the security control without having to queue at the check-in desk. Download it together with yours when doing online checkin.
Notification system update

As well as lounging next to the pool and doing a bit of hiking, our developers have spent the summer giving our app a fresh lick of paint. We're preparing new features for the next few weeks, which we're sure you'll like and will make your experience with Vueling's app even better! Stay tuned!

September, the month we get back into our usual routine... or not. To make it more bearable, we have a new release: an app with improved performance adapted to iOS 13, the brand new operating system from Apple. Update to the latest version and start enjoying it today!

September, the month we get back into our usual routine... or not. To make it more bearable, we have a new release: an app with improved performance adapted to iOS 13, the brand new operating system from Apple. Update to the latest version and start enjoying it today!

In this new upgrade, you'll notice that our app has been given a small makeover.
And as usual, we've corrected some minor issues and enhanced the performance of our app.

In this new upgrade, you'll notice that our app has been given a small makeover.
And as usual, we've corrected some minor issues and enhanced the performance of our app.

This update lets you add priority boarding when you have completed the booking. That means you'll be one of the first to board and will have guaranteed space for your cabin bag. We've also made a few tweaks here and there to boost the performance of the app. We hope you enjoy it!

After spending the last few weeks tweaking it here and there, we're finally ready for the great unveiling. Discover our new design for selecting flights - a more visual and super simple way to choose the best option for your trip and the fare that best suits your needs. What do you think? Cool, isn't it?

After spending the last few weeks tweaking it here and there, we're finally ready for the great unveiling. Discover our new design for selecting flights - a more visual and super simple way to choose the best option for your trip and the fare that best suits your needs. What do you think? Cool, isn't it?
This update has improved priority boarding booking (remember: you and your bag board the plane first!). Enjoy the app, as usual!

This update improves the automated management of bookings, so you don't need to worry if there are any changes to your flight. Obviously, we'll do our best to make sure that doesn't happen. See you in the app!

This update improves the automated management of bookings, so you don't need to worry if there are any changes to your flight. Obviously, we'll do our best to make sure that doesn't happen. See you in the app!
This new version contains an update on the travel documents required from now on. Please bear the new requirements in mind.

In this new upgrade, you'll notice that our app has been given a small makeover.

And as usual, we've corrected some minor issues and enhanced the performance of our app.

With this update you will be able to access the Flight Credit service on our app. If we have given you Flight Credit for your flights, you will now be able to use your balance to book with us again.
With this update you will be able to access the Flight Credit service on our app. If we have given you Flight Credit for your flights, you will now be able to use your balance to book with us again.

This new update includes a new request for documentation, which is necessary on all routes and for all passengers except for those under 14 years travelling on domestic flights. Remember that you must also wear a face mask when you fly.

In this new upgrade, you'll notice that our app has been given a small makeover.
And as usual, we've corrected some minor issues and enhanced the performance of our app.

Take flight with us! We have updated our app and, amongst other things, we have redesigned the fare selection option so it is easier to choose the fares that best suit your trips. Safety continues to be our top priority, and on all flights we take every precaution to protect your health and that of everyone else on board. Start enjoying summer now!

In this new upgrade, you'll notice that our app has been given a small makeover.
And as usual, we've corrected some minor issues and enhanced the performance of our app.

We have updated our app and corrected a few errors so it runs smoothly. Your safety continues to be our top priority, so when you fly with us you’ll find that on all flights we take every precaution to protect your health and that of everyone else on board. Take flight with us this summer!

With this new update we have improved the performance of our app. This new version enables you to access your personal area more comfortably and securely. And much more! Enjoy it now and book your next getaway with us!

We have updated our app and corrected a few errors so it runs smoothly. Your safety continues to be our top priority, so when you fly with us you’ll find that on all flights we take every precaution to protect your health and that of everyone else on board. Take flight with us this summer!

We have updated our app and corrected a few errors so it runs smoothly. Your safety continues to be our top priority, so when you fly with us you’ll find that on all flights we take every precaution to protect your health and that of everyone else on board. Take flight with us this summer!

Some of us haven't been on holiday yet, so we've taken the chance to work on our app and fix a few minor issues. It's now ready for you to book your next getaway with us! Make the most of the last days of summer or get ready for autumn. September will be more enjoyable if you travel!

September is coming to an end and we have improved our online check-in process to make it really easy for you to get your boarding passes. Remember that we have put a range of measures in place to keep you safe and make sure you have a comfortable trip. See you on board soon!

With this new update, your payments through our app will be even more secure. Now, depending on which card your are using, you will have to confirm the purchase with your bank. With more secure payments you'll fly even higher!

Would you like to put your money aside to enjoy a trip in the future? We are now offering Flight Credit for bookings you already have or are going to make with us. It is safer, more convenient and you can book with confidence. Thanks for booking with Vueling!

Latest update and new features! We've changed our luggage policy to make the boarding process faster and safer. What do you want to carry with you on board: just one underseat bag or two pieces of hand luggage? You can either drop off your cabin bag at the check-in desk or carry it with you on board.
We have updated our app and corrected a few errors so it runs smoothly.

This update includes new functions that improve your experience with the app, improves its performance and fixes a few small issues. Remember that we have put a range of measures in place to keep you safe and make sure you have a comfortable trip. See you on board soon!

2021 is here and we're starting off the year with renewed energy! We've been working on our app over the past few weeks to improve its performance and make processes smoother. We hope to welcome you on board again very soon. Happy New Year!
We have updated our app and corrected a few errors so it runs smoothly.
We have updated our app and corrected a few errors so it runs smoothly.
We have updated our app and corrected a few errors so it runs smoothly.
We have a new feature – the new widget for iOS 14. Update your device and start to enjoy it now! A very handy and easy way to find your flight, add your booking and check in.
We have updated our app and corrected a few errors so it runs smoothly.
We have updated our app and corrected a few errors so it runs smoothly.
We are always thinking of new ways to help you plan your trips and offer you great flexibility. This is why we now have a new product: Flex Pack. Purchase it if you book the Basic Fare!
We are always thinking of new ways to help you plan your trips and offer you great flexibility. This is why we now have a new product: Flex Pack. Purchase it if you book the Basic Fare!
We have updated our app and corrected a few errors so it runs smoothly.
We have updated our app and corrected a few errors so it runs smoothly.
Summer is just around the corner and we're offering destinations at fantastic prices so you can have the holiday you deserve. Update our app to get all our latest news and special offers!
Summer and fun are a perfect match! Update our app and enjoy Vueling Activities: the best museums, tours and exhibitions are waiting for you. You can't afford to miss it!

Now you can support Save the Children on our app too. When you get to the payment screen, you can donate EUR 1 to help child refugees.

And as usual, we have enhanced our app's performance and features. Have a great summer!
